=======
History
=======


0.1.1 (2017-04-22)
------------------

* `ndiff` now takes a keyword-only argument `cutoff` to specify reaplce line matching ratio cutoff, as `BlockDiffContext` does.


0.1.0 (2017-04-22)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
* Initial release with just an `ndiff` API.
